short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your tasks and time spent on each task

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You may think it is just another to do list, but let me tell you in this is a task tracker, a to do list but you can track how long each task takes, you can 

- Add new tasks
- Start/stop time tracking for each task
- Delete individual tasks
- Clear all tasks
- Export your tasks (into excel format or txt)

You can reach out to me for project or work :)
email: namanshaheer@gmail.com
